cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
project(strp_fau_strpmessage)

## Compile as C++11, supported in ROS Kinetic and newer
add_compile_options(-std=c++11)

find_package(catkin REQUIRED COMPONENTS
    roscpp
    std_msgs
    message_generation
    its_container_v2_its_container
)
find_package(Boost)

add_message_files(
    FILES
    Accept.msg             
    Cancel.msg                 
    DistanceAlongPath.msg      
    FixedBlock.msg             
    PositionGate.msg           
    ReferencePosition.msg      
    Reject.msg                 
    RelativePosition_east.msg  
    RelativePosition.msg       
    RelativePosition_north.msg
    RelativePosition_up.msg
    RequestID.msg
    Request.msg
    ReservationShape.msg
    SpaceTimeReservationProcedure.msg
    STRPMessageType.msg
    TimeGate.msg
    TimeOffset.msg
)

generate_messages(
    DEPENDENCIES
    std_msgs
    its_container_v2_its_container
)

# target_include_directories(sender PRIVATE include ${catkin_INCLUDE_DIRS})
# install(TARGETS sender RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CATKIN_PACKAGE_BIN_DESTINATION})
##------------------------------------------------##

catkin_package(
    # INCLUDE_DIRS include  # This indicates that the folder "include" within the package folder is where exported headers go
    CATKIN_DEPENDS message_runtime std_msgs
    # CATKIN_DEPENDS message_runtime roscpp
)
